entry.title: ROSEBURG HAS SECOND RECORD BREAKING HIGH IN A ROW
entry.summary: March 1, 2025 6:15 a.m. Roseburg had a record-breaking high temperature for the date on Friday. entry.title: Tense Standoff Ends in Peaceful Arrests; Charges Dropped for Domestic Assault
entry.summary: A tense standoff in Douglas County ended peacefully with the arrest of a man and woman after a domestic dispute. Initial assault charges were dropped, with the man facing a felony weapons charge. The case remains under review.
